name: Deep Space Frontier (Oroppo, Nivica, KaiJ124, XDTrae, rcfieldhouse, Mohit)
name_original: Deep Space Frontier (Oroppo, Nivica, KaiJ124, XDTrae, rcfieldhouse, Mohit)
description:
Deep Space Frontier will have players follow a 3 person special ops unit as they explore an unknown alien world in search of resources that may save their species from extinction. 

At the start of the game, players have the option to choose one of 3 classes with unique characteristics and weapons. Gameplay will involve this team fighting through and holding off hordes of foreign monsters as they collect resources to upgrade their skills and establish their base of operations in an effort to fight the final boss at the end of the level.

Check out our Twitter for more game updates!
https://twitter.com/AmnesiaInteract
